text: Josh Jauncey (born February 10, 1993) is a Canadian kickboxer who competes in the Glory Lightweight division. ==Biography and career== ===Biography=== Born in London, England, Josh moved to Vancouver, Canada at three years old with his family, where his father began running the gym World Kickboxing Academy. Josh took an interest in taking after his father and started his amateur career at age nine. ===Career=== In November 2018 Jauncey challenged long reigning lightweight champion Sitthichai Sitsongpeenong for the Glory title and lost by decision.http://combatpress.com/2018/11/glory-61-new-york-results/ As of March 2016 he was ranked #10 lightweight in the world by Combat Press.http://combatpress.com/2016/03/combat-press-kickboxing-rankings- march-2016/ ==Titles and achievements== Amateur * WKL Super Welterweight North American Champion * * WKL Super Welterweight Pacific Northwest Champion * * TBA-SK Super Welterweight Pacific Northwest Champion * * CMTA Jr British Columbia Champion * * CMTA Jr Canadian Champion * * GG Promotions Junior World Champion ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=95% style="clear:both;
